thread.title: High 5 Games Partners with Carnival Corporation & plc
thread.title_full: High 5 Games Partners with Carnival Corporation & plc - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: High 5 Games Partners with Carnival Corporation & plc
text:
High 5 Games
NEW YORK , Oct. 13, High 5 Games and Carnival Corporation & plc have announced an agreement that will bring H5G's premium slot machines to Carnival's ships around the world.
As a part of Carnival's on-property mobile gaming solution, High 5 Games will initially be available on select ships with the possibility of expanding to additional ships over the next couple of years; Carnival Corporation currently operates 100 cruise ships worldwide. This partnership further expands the player reach of High 5 Games content and aims to entertain the millions of cruise guests who sail Carnival's brands each year.
"We're excited at the prospect of adding High 5 Games' content to our mobile gaming platform," said Paul Jarvis , Vice President of Gaming Operations for Carnival. "We know our guests will be delighted by the high quality graphics and immersive gameplay of their extensive catalog."
High 5 Games premium slots will be delivered seamlessly through the company's Remote Game Server VAULT. The initial game launch will include ten of High 5 Games' most popular titles. Additionally, Carnival will have access to VAULT's full content library of 72 slot titles available for future distribution.
Carnival represents a fourth distribution partner for High 5 Games, making the company a full content solutions provider across multiple venues including land-based, B2B Real Money Gaming, social, and now on-property mobile gaming thanks to Carnival.
About High 5 Games
Developing for the land-based, online, social, and mobile markets, High 5 Games has created hundreds of games that are played on six continents and in more than 150 countries. High 5 Games operates High 5 Casino, a top-rated social casino on Facebook. The company's premiere remote game server VAULT is live in New Jersey and all regulated markets in the EU and features the company's most proven brands. High 5 Games is aimed at becoming the world leader in casino content production and distribution and has offices in New York City, New Jersey , Kansas City , and London .
About Carnival Corporation & plc
Carnival Corporation & plc is the largest cruise company in the world, with a portfolio of 10 cruise brands in North America , Europe , Australia and Asia , comprised of Carnival Cruise Line, Holland America Line, Princess Cruises, Seabourn, AIDA Cruises, Costa Cruises, Cunard, P&O Cruises ( Australia ), P&O Cruises (UK) and Fathom.
Together, these brands will operate 100 ships in 2015 totaling 219,000 lower berths with 17 new ships scheduled to be delivered between 2016 and 2022. Carnival Corporation & plc also operates Holland America Princess Alaska Tours, the leading tour companies in Alaska and the Canadian Yukon. Traded on both the New York and London Stock Exchanges, Carnival Corporation & plc is the only group in the world to be included in both the S&P 500 and the FTSE 100 indices.
Additional information can be found on www.carnival.com , www.hollandamerica.com , www.princess.com , www.seabourn.com , www.aida.de , www.costacruise.com , www.cunard.com , www.pocruises.com.au , www.pocruises.com and www.fathom.org .
